### CCTV Installation for CSC Jamieson Community Correctional Centre
#### Reference Number: PW-__HN-467-81397
#### Amendment Number: 3
#### Solicitation Number: 21120-214804/A
#### Publication Date: 2022-09-23
#### Tender Closing Date: 2022-12-13T14:00:00

The Correctional Service of Canada (CSC) requires the installation of IP cameras and video management equipment at the Jamieson Community Correctional Centre (CCC) in Dartmouth, Nova Scotia. The centre provides a structured living environment with 24-hour supervision and housing for offenders on various types of release. The work must be accomplished with minimal disruption to the daily operation and security of the institution.

#### Key Requirements
* Design, supply, installation, testing, and training of IP cameras and video management equipment
* Compliance with Statement of Technical Requirements (STR) outlined in Annex A
* Completion of work within 12 weeks after contract award

#### Optional Site Visit
An optional site visit has been scheduled for October 18, 2022, at 10:00 AM at the Jamieson Community Correctional Centre. Interested bidders must meet at the Principal Entrance of 19 Morris Drive, Dartmouth, Nova Scotia B3B 0M3. Bidders will be required to sign an attendance form at the site visit and provide identification prior to accessing the site.

#### Important Notes
* Bidders who do not attend the site visit may still submit a bid
* The onus is on the bidder to arrive at the site visit in a timely manner
* Only one attendee per bidder is allowed at the site visit

#### Tender Description
This request for proposal (RFP) is open to all interested suppliers. The trade agreement is the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), and the competitive procurement strategy is lowest/lower bid.
